title: Deception
description: Rebecca Green was just your average 20 year old, until the father she never knew left her something she never expected.
quote: How do you happen to have two guns?
altHero: Lindsay Lohan runs away from an approaching car
alt1: Lohan in the scope of a gun
alt2: Lohan and James Franco behind a fence
alt3: Lohan and Franco running away from an explosion
